title: SLO Primer
content: TTFT captures first-token responsiveness and should be tracked with p50 p95 p99 views.

title: Kernel Signals
content: DNS latency and TCP retransmits are frequent hidden causes of LLM tail latency.

title: Correlation
content: Join eBPF telemetry with trace identifiers and confidence thresholds to avoid noisy attribution.

title: Incident Lab
content: Deterministic scenarios with fixed seeds provide reproducible reliability demonstrations.

title: Benchmarking
content: Release regression gates require confidence intervals and reproducible artifact bundles.
